entry.title: Stanley--Reisner rings of generalised truncation polytopes and their moment-angle manifolds
entry.summary: We consider simple polytopes $P=vc^{k}(\Delta^{n_{1}}\times\ldots\times\Delta^{n_{r}})$, for $n_1\ge\ldots\ge n_r\ge 1,r\ge 1,k\ge 0$, that is, $k$-vertex cuts of a product of simplices, and call them {\emph{generalized truncation polytopes}}. For these polytopes we describe the cohomology ring of the corresponding moment-angle manifold $\mathcal Z_P$ and explore some topological consequences of this calculation. We also examine minimal non-Golodness for their Stanley--Reisner rings and relate it to the property of $\mathcal Z_P$ being a connected sum of sphere products.
